name: Google Maps Platform connector
description: The Google Maps connector validates addresses, retrieves postal addresses and calculates distances

properties.label: API key
properties.description: Google Maps Platform API key. Details in the connector documentation

properties.label: Region code
properties.description: You can find supported regions here supported regions

properties.label: Locality
properties.description: An incorporated city or town political entity

properties.label: Address
properties.description: Unstructured address. Details in a connector documentation

properties.label: Address
properties.description: Complete address. Details in a connector documentation

properties.label: Destination
properties.description: The place ID value that you want to use as the destination for calculating distance

properties.label: Origin
properties.description: The place ID value that you want to use as the starting point for calculating distance

properties.label: Units
properties.description: Specifies the unit system to use when displaying results

properties.label: Mode
properties.description: You can specify the transportation mode to use when calculating distances and directions

properties.label: Connection timeout
properties.description: Sets the timeout in seconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout

pattern.message: Must be a timeout in seconds (default value is 20 seconds) or a FEEL expression

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation
